input.text: Hi. Spiky here. In this video, I'm going to show you how to install the good, old, MSDOS, version 6 point 22, together with Windows 3 point 11, into a ProxMox Virtual Machine. I couldn't find any solution for this online. So, this Tutorial might as well be the first? Let's go! A quick note. You can follow all steps in this video tutorial, at my Github page.
